title: Sample, ca. 1955
medium:
Medium: cotton and synthetic metal
Technique: Plain weave
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 20.3 x 16.5 cm (8 in. x 6 1/2 in.)
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy (Liebes) Morin
description:
Plain weave with paired warps of black cotton and wide flat strips of synthetic metal. 
Warp: 2 ply black cotton and black bouclé in random arrangement. 
Weft: flat yellow metallic alternating with 2 wide black cheniile yarn.
